title: "Punched Out" by Tobias Sommer. Pretty fun concept.
author: theplatypus

comments.content: that is cute. Maybe it's time for a new weight. Thin, Regular, Bold, Black, 3D!

I definitely second the 3D weight.

w|m
Yves recently [interviewed the designer for The FontFeed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018053456/http:/fontfeed.com/archives/focus-on-fontstructors-%E2%80%93-tobias-sommer-shasta/).

Reminds me of Alpha Geometrique:  
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/AlphaGeometrique](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018053456/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/AlphaGeometrique "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/AlphaGeometrique")

useless but appealing nonetheless

pbc
